name: Stellar Surveyor Simulator
description:
You have been contracted by the powers-that-be to complete a survey of the galaxy.

Accelerate with the UP key

Turn left with the LEFT key

Turn right with the RIGHT key

Brake to stop all movement with the DOWN key

Utilize the experimental teleport drive by pressing the T key

Fire your survey cannon by pressing the SPACEBAR

Reset the game with the R key

Fire your survey cannon at planets and other celestial bodies to mark them as surveyed.

Move your craft over planets to learn more about them.

Look out for stars and monstrous planets!
